about_the_game:
Chaos Faction and Chaos Faction 2, the iconic Flash games that defined a generation, come together in the Chaos Faction Legacy Collection, both in their original format. Whether you’re a veteran of the chaotic battles or a newcomer ready to experience the mayhem for the first time, this collection is the ultimate tribute to the legendary brawlers.



Two Games, One Legacy
The original Chaos Faction set the standard for fast-paced, explosive arena combat. Customize your character, select your weapons, and face off across a range of creative and dangerous levels. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Chaos Faction became a staple of Flash gaming, now available to relive in its full glory.

Chaos Faction 2, the sequel, builds on everything that made the original a hit and takes it to the next level. Battle through 15 campaign levels, each filled with weapons, characters, and moves, plus even more explosions. Progress unlocks powerful new fighters and gear (Three brand new bonus characters included!), leading to an epic showdown with the Hypergon.

Endless Gameplay Modes
With multiple gameplay modes, including Campaign, Deathmatch, and Survival, you can enjoy countless hours of chaotic action. In Campaign mode, every victory unlocks new characters and weapons, pushing you closer to the ultimate battle. Deathmatch mode lets you create your own rules, offering endless replayability with customizable maps, enemies, and allies. And in Survival mode, test your skills against an onslaught of increasingly difficult foes.

Join the Chaos
Whether you’re playing solo or with a friend in Local Co-Op, the Chaos Faction Legacy Collection delivers non-stop action, hilarious mayhem, and a nostalgic gaming experience. Customize your characters, dominate the arenas, and relive the legacy of one of the greatest series in Flash game history. It’s time to reclaim your place in the chaos!
